newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Nov industrial output up 3.22 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Nov industrial output up 3.22 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Taiwan's industrial output in November rose 3.22 percent compared to November 1995, the economics ministry said on Friday.
In month-on-month terms, November industrial output was down 0.27 percent from October, the ministry said.
The manufacturing index, including metals, machinery, information electronics, chemical and consumer products, rose 4.32 percent in November from the same month a year ago.
Real estate and construction industry output fell 27.13 percent from a year earlier. Mining industry output was down 6.65 percent compared with a year ago.
